# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.x.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability within this project, please send an e-mail to Magno Bi√©t via [magno.biet@gmail.com](mailto:magno.biet@gmail.com). All security vulnerabilities will be promptly addressed.
